website_summaries.verdict: These 1,000 mAh rechargeable battery packs fit your controllers seamlessly.
pros: If you don't like the idea of a bulky charging pack, this pair of rechargeable battery packs may be right for you
To charge the controllers, set them in the base until the indicator LED turns green
cons: USB wall adapter not included, so you'll need to buy it separately
Can be difficult to tell if controllers are in place on charging station

website_summaries.verdict: A premium charging station that can deliver up to 33 hours of playtime on a single charge.
pros: Equipped with 1000mah NiMH battery packs that ensure you can continue to use your controller for an extended period of time after charging
Begins to charge a controller automatically without needing to remove the battery from the charging station
Compatible with Xbox One and Xbox One X controllers
cons: Stand can be sensitive, so it may take a few minutes to get a controller to fit into the stand properly for charging

customer_reviews.title: not to good
customer_reviews.text: only lasted about 6 months After recieving an email from fosmon that they would replace the charging station if I called them at 612-435-7508. Their main menu sent me to a voicemail where i left my name and number and reason for call. A week + later and no email or phone call. I also called back 2 addtional times and was sent to the same voice mail. Theese companies take the time to read everybodies reviews and respond to negative reviews claiming to be only a phone call away. All there trying to do is erase the negative review in the eyes of potential customers reading reviews before they make there purchase. Thats just shady in my eyes.
customer_reviews.author: Bryan

customer_reviews.title: Necessity for any gamer!!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this product because I was tired of having to change out the batteries on my Xbox remote all of the time. I even had rechargeable AA batteries but they would always die mid game and I would have to run and go change them quickly before I died. I really wanted a way that I could just set down my controller and it would charge when I am not playing and that is exactly what the Fosmon charger does. I can game for multiple hours with no problem and then put it on the charger until the next time I play. If you are on the fence about getting this just do it. You will thank me later.
customer_reviews.author: Aaron B.

customer_reviews.title: Also this charger can charge two controllers at once And it’s easy to tell when the battery is fully charged by ...
customer_reviews.text: My husband was so excited when I got him this charger. I know he’s been wanting it for long time, no more buying big packages of battery. Yay ,Also this charger can charge two controllers at once And it’s easy to tell when the battery is fully charged by looking at the solid green light. Great gift for game lovers .
customer_reviews.author: Henchman

customer_reviews.title: Excellent battery pack and charging station
customer_reviews.text: The battery pack helped with the challenge of having to replace AA batteries when in middle of a game. The charging stations are very easy to setup. Just replace AA battery with the rechargeable battery and place on the charging station. The charging station has a USB to micro-USB cable. My only complaint is that it would have been better if there was a longer cable and a wall charger unit also added. with a short cable with no wall charger, the only option was to either get a wall charger with USB port or connect the Fosmon to Xbox console.
customer_reviews.author: VJ

customer_reviews.title: Great docking station! Very nice, smart, and simple way to charge multiple controllers.
customer_reviews.text: The docking station is pretty and fits nicely in my entertainment center space for my gaming stuff. The only issue I have is that one of the rechargeable battery packs' doesn't fit right. It's like the plastic prong teeth are bent. So when it's inserted correctly into any of my (5) controllers the pieces aren't flush. There's a small gap between the battery pack segment and the controller. It still seems to work so I haven't bothered to report it or replace it. The instructions were very easy to understand as well. Be sure to read them because inserting the battery packs is sightly different than you'd be used to. :)
customer_reviews.author: Erin

customer_reviews.title: Best way to keep controllers charged.
customer_reviews.text: While the battery is a tight fit that gives you a slight trouble, it is well worth it, a single charge lasts over half a week with quite a bit of use every day. The charging cradle doesn't grip the controllers, instead it relies on the curves holding it in place so you're better off placing the stand on the console. Charging takes quite a few hours but using a wall charger cuts that time significantly. Overall the appearance doesn't inspire much confidence until you use it, which blows away much of its competition. The batteries are superb, getting 2 sweetens the deal. This is the go to charging station at the moment.
customer_reviews.author: Homar Olivares

customer_reviews.title: Great for gamers
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my husband and he absolutely loves it! He no longer has to worry about batteries dying and he can charge 2 controllers at a time.
customer_reviews.author: Lizy Morrell

customer_reviews.title: Best charging station so far!
customer_reviews.text: I have had 3 charging stations so far, this is the best. Easy to sit controllers on for charging no messing with the way they sit on it, great connection for the controller charge pads to the stations charging needles! Love the led indicators! I have since bought a second one!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Terrible customer service
customer_reviews.text: The unit that I received did not work at all. The charger would not replenish the batteries that came with it. I really wanted this item and so I tried to give Fosmon an opportunity to fix it. After MANY attempts at trying to reach the company over the course of two weeks, I received no help and could not even get an email back or get anyone to answer either of the phone numbers the company provided. This has been extremely frustrating and they have definitely lost a customer.
customer_reviews.author: Kristopher

customer_reviews.title: Lies
customer_reviews.text: Does not work with elite controller like advertised. Do not buy
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Stopped working after only one month
customer_reviews.text: Ordered and received this feb 9 2018. It worked great the first month BUT then my son starts asking for batteries again and tells me it’s not working. This was the reason we bought this-to eliminate buying batteries all the time. Waste of money because sadly it’s past the return window. Very disappointed
customer_reviews.author: Lisa Esposto

customer_reviews.title: Easy To Use
customer_reviews.text: You gotta get it. It's probably one of the best charging docks on the market. On top of this it has one of the highest volumes for batteries out of the competition (800 mah). My favorite part about it though is I've owned other docks and usually you have to slide it into a charging port or dock it in a weird way which over time will destroy the ports but this one all you have to do is place it on the slide and it falls onto the contact points. It's super easy to just grab, play, then throw it back on the dock. I recommend it heavily.
customer_reviews.author: Joseph S.

customer_reviews.title: Great way to save on battries!
customer_reviews.text: Ok so walked through the door and found that they had delivered the Fosmon package Great. Heard good things about it so this will be the fisrt review and if anything happens I will update. The charging station seems pretty light but for me is seems to get the job done so kudos! Setup wasn't bad either batteries slipped in really well without and hitches. If you follow the recommended charging times I think they are already half charged so charging it never took that long for me. As for the 33hrs play time I will have to comment later. They feel really sturdy in the controllers so no issues there either. So far so good.
customer_reviews.author: kevin Simpson

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!! I wish I bought it sooner!
customer_reviews.text: Omg, a life/money saver!! I purchased an Xbox for my daughter’s and the remotes kept dying! I had to waste so much money to keep buying batteries! I came across this on Amazon and decided to purchase one. It charges both paddles perfectly and even lasts longer then the batteries did! The battery packs fit perfectly into the Xbox paddles. Man, get this! You will not regret it!
customer_reviews.author: Kristina S.

customer_reviews.title: It works fine. Battery loader indicator is very useful
customer_reviews.text: It works fine. Battery loader indicator is very useful. My control fits very well to it. The shape of the charger allows to save space and it can be placed in reduced areas. It can connect directly to the xbox which is so convenient as there is no need for one more wire behind all the electronics. I am happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Gave me a 3rd degree burn, destroyed controller
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this in August 2019. Up untill yesterday I only used one controller and never had the 2nd battery used at all. Yesterday I purchased a 2nd controller and placed the Fosmon battery in it and placed it on the charger. The lights flashed green letting me know it was charging. This afternoon I was sitting on my couch and heard a very soft popping sound and a squeaky hiss. Turned out the battery over heated. Fearing a fire I picked up the controller with battery and I burned my hand. WTF?
customer_reviews.author: David

customer_reviews.title: Best Charger for Your Xbox One Controllers
customer_reviews.text: This charger is great!!! The charging insert fit right into the slot and the controllers still look very nice. I was wary to go with some of the other products that weren't flush and I'm glad I didn't. This charges both controllers quickly and plugs right into the Xbox One usb port. It's relatively low and fits on the shelf right next to the Xbox One even with the controllers on it.
customer_reviews.author: Bruce W.

customer_reviews.title: Batteries were easy to put on and fit perfectly
customer_reviews.text: It is exactly what I wanted. Batteries were easy to put on and fit perfectly. The charger changed quickly and holds charge. And usb fits in my tv, less cords everywhere
customer_reviews.author: Anna M Roberts

customer_reviews.title: ***DANGER***FIRE HAZARD***
customer_reviews.text: FIRE HAZARD We have had the charger for about 6 months. Today when my sone went to use it the battery was hot and melted the plastic. I think he may have caught this just in time to prevent a house fire.
customer_reviews.author: Joseph E.

customer_reviews.title: Not bad, works as designed
customer_reviews.text: Recently purchased an Xbox One. Was still using disposable batteries with the controllers. This solves the problems. Battery pack fits in the controller snuggly and is easy to rest controller in the docking station. Uses a micro USB cord to power station, you need to supply power adapter. Minus 1 star. Two green lights flash while charging and stay on when fully charged. On my unit, one light is partially dim. Minus 1 star.
customer_reviews.author: Jenna Maguire

customer_reviews.title: A worthwhile alternative to batteries--in theory
customer_reviews.text: As the title states, this is a worthwhile alternative in theory to disposable batteries for Xbox controllers. Everything was working great with them and less than 20 days since I placed my order, one of the charging pods has failed. I can get a charge only on 1 of the 2 of them. I've unplugged it, cleaned the contacts, switched batteries, controllers--literally everything I can think of. Unfortunately nothing has worked. Maybe I got a dud? 1/21/20--I've reached out to the seller to find out if there's anything else that can be done. Will update my review accordingly.
customer_reviews.author: JR

customer_reviews.title: Awesome.
customer_reviews.text: These are great so your controllers don’t have to be charged with that long usb cable. Keeps my things more organized. They come with their own batteries which have less mah (smaller battery capacity) than the Xbox packs but still last a very long time. I have two controllers and just rotate them out when I’m playing for a long time. I wanna say they do a good 4-6 hours of straight gameplay maybe slightly longer. The stand blinks when the controller is charger and goes to solid green when charged. Simple and to the point. Well done fosmmon !!
customer_reviews.author: Frank

customer_reviews.title: Not a good fit
customer_reviews.text: Promptly put back in box and started return. This charger is not good. I purchased a different one (I won't name it because I don't want to seem like a paid reviewer) with my xbox one s and should have just got it in the first place. This one has no way to tell when the controllers are in place. No click...no real cradle when seated. The battery packs/covers are a tight fit and could be an issue. The charger is simply a USB to micro USB with no wall charger so it must be plugged into your xbox. The dock feels cheaply made. But hey...it looks nice! Returned and bought the original which was only a few dollars more
customer_reviews.author: K. K

customer_reviews.title: Long lasting battery life
customer_reviews.text: After 3 months of use, I have had absolutely no issues with these batteries or the charging station. After fully charging the batteries, I have never had them run out of power while playing....and sometimes we play for hours. The batteries were simple to install. My only complaint/suggestion would be that they start offering alternate colors. These were the black style, and they also offer white, however I have a controller that I bought from Microsoft with customized colors, so now the controller looks a bit goofy with a black battery. Otherwise, I'd suggest these to anyone that want to add wireless charging to their controllers.
customer_reviews.author: David

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't fit Xbox One Controllers
customer_reviews.text: Battery packs won't fit my xbox one controllers. I put in a good 30 minutes trying to get em to "snap in"......Won't clip all the way in. The battery packs work but it's not securely fastened. There's a gap where it should be snapped in.
customer_reviews.author: Chris K.

customer_reviews.title: Failed but not because of the batteries - BUT - Follow Up
customer_reviews.text: UPDATE: I initially wrote this review when the device failed to charge the battery packs. However since I properly registered the device with the company, they honored a warranty replacement of the unit at no cost. So although the device itself failed, the company did a nice recovery in providing a replacement. Literally 2 years to the day, the charging dock no longer passes power through the USB charging connection. the mini-USB connector in the back of the charging dock appears to have failed even though when this device was setup initially, it was never moved since. Did a little wiggle jiggle on the port and the power lights would blink once and nothing more.
customer_reviews.author: Mr. G

customer_reviews.title: Constantly lost power when in use.
customer_reviews.text: After only a couple days, the dock would show the packs as fully charged but 20-40 minutes into game play the controller would lose power and not turn back on unless the battery pack was removed, then replaced, then docked for at least 10-15 seconds, then powered back on. After that sequence it would work for another 20-40 minutes and the issue would repeat. I swapped back to normal AA batteries from the dollar store and the controllers work great. After two weeks of trying to use this kit, I returned it.
customer_reviews.author: Lestan Gregor

customer_reviews.title: Would recommend for anyone.
customer_reviews.text: This project works exactly like you would expect. It's plug-and-play, as in it's very easy to use. I love that we're not eating through batteries for the controllers I wish I'd bought this sooner. We are 9 months down the road, the charge is lasting just the same as it did when they were new. The charges last a good long time and they don't dissipate if you don't use the controllers immediately after charging. Honestly feels like the charge on the batteries last longer van the life of traditional batteries in the controllers.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Only 7 months
customer_reviews.text: Bought this as I do a lot of online gaming. Didn't need them for hours of play but regular batteries drained really fast. Worked great for a couple of months. Now the packs refuse to hold a charge for more then 15 mins after being charged for 20 hours! Green bar on the charging station is solid before used. So unless I leave the packs on the base for multiple days, they've become kind of useless. I knew I would need to replace them some time but I didn't think a mere 7 months later they'd be utterly useless!
customer_reviews.author: Alison

customer_reviews.title: Xbox One S & X Dual Controller Charger
customer_reviews.text: I have to say when I purchased this I was in need of a way to charge my xbox one controllers. Overall this is a great charger. It comes with 2 batteries that fit my controllers well. The only issue I do not like is that cable that came with mine was short, and I had to find my own power adapter to charge the controllers with. I think this product for the price would of been more beneficial if it had a longer usb cord and power prong to charge the controllers. That is honestly my only issue with it, other than that is charges controllers with no issues and the battery hold a good charge as well.
customer_reviews.author: xCriosx

customer_reviews.title: Not good
customer_reviews.text: This would be great if the charge lasted longer than an hour. I'm pretty sure that dollar store batteries would last longer than the charge in this battery pack. I've only tried one of the two batteries that came with it. Maybe the one I'm using is defective, but so far, that's my experience. Charges quickly, in about an hour, but after using it for about an hour, I get the notice that my controller battery is low.
customer_reviews.author: EMW

customer_reviews.title: Very durable
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for a gift so we yet have used it. But when I bought this, it was like the same day and the company had already sent me an email about how to properly install the rechargable batteries and if I had any problem to contact them!!! Well I received the charging dock and wanted to make sure the battery pack would fit in the controller. It did. Fit perfectly! The docking station is very well made and very durable! Battery life I can't not reveal because I haven't tried it yet. Would definitely recommend this to Xbox users!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great product ~ worth every penny!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my 11 year old son for Christmas because the ports on the charging stand that originally came with his Xbox got loose so charging was spotty and they eventually broke. This product by Fosmon is SO much easier for him to use. You simply sit the controller on the cradle and that's it. No plugging the controller itself into a port that will eventually break. This was definitely worth every penny!
customer_reviews.author: Lauren Martin

customer_reviews.title: Good product, great price.  Works as expected.
customer_reviews.text: Works exactly as expected. Haven't tried it on one charge to see how long it lasts but anticipate it should work as advertised. Was a bit tricky to get the battery into the controller but I wasn't sure if I was doing it right but eventually got it in. Sits well on the recharging unit. Please be advised this does not have a power unit that plugs into the wall, rather it is a USB charging cable. Fortunately, we had a USB charging port close to our TV where we wanted to keep the charging unit.
customer_reviews.author: David L.

customer_reviews.title: 50% okay
customer_reviews.text: Only one of the batteries fit the controllers, for a reason I'm still not able to explain. One batt fit just like butter, no issues, and charging wise is fine too. But the other simply just doesn't fit. Sucks to have paid full price for only being able to use half. Would not recommend. Would not purchase again. (Would have returned if I hadn't hastily tossed packaging upon opening)
customer_reviews.author: einalem

customer_reviews.title: Nice product while it lasted but had hoped to get more life out of them
customer_reviews.text: Christmas gift for our kid's Xbox - fit great though the boys didn't like that the black batteries didn't match with their white controllers. Worked well for 8-10 months then they wouldn't hold a charge for more than 30 minutes. Retired them shortly after. A little disappointed considering the cost to run vs just replacing with AA batteries. Color match options would be nice. Longer battery life would be even better. Probably won't be replacing them and reverting back to AA batteries.
customer_reviews.author: PTM 109

customer_reviews.title: Worked for 4 months then broke
customer_reviews.text: Worked fine for 4 months, then started randomly flashing both lights and would not charge. If I could manage to get it to charge a controller- it would barely charge the battery. I got maybe 10 minutes play time before it was dead again. Then I would have to set it on the charger & pick it back up for 5 minutes before the light would show charging... Then it would glitch out again. Useless junk now. Had to switch to rechargeable eneloop batteries bought locally...
customer_reviews.author: Amy

customer_reviews.title: Not a proper fit for controllers
customer_reviews.text: I think these are a way better option than batteries or the wired charging kits. Downside, which is major and basically makes these garbage too, is the battery pack doesn’t fit properly. So I’ve had instances where I lose connection cause it’s coming out, or other times my controllers just stop working, because it stopped registering the battery pack... this is very unfortunate Andy makes these obsolete. I’d say good idea, terrible design though
customer_reviews.author: Adam

customer_reviews.title: Great value for a great product!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Great rechargeable battery set for the Xbox one controllers. The base makes the controllers sit where they need to be in order for them to charge. No fidgeting around to make the connection. The batteries seem great but while not in use I set them back on the base so I have never had them run out of battery nor even get a low battery from them. Save tons of money on batteries and get this for your home! You won’t be disappointed!!
customer_reviews.author: Anthony Zaffarano

customer_reviews.title: FIRE HAZARD! DONT BUY!
customer_reviews.text: After being woken up at 2am by my dog growling at a strange popping and sizzling sound. I immediately could smell burning plastic. I located where the sound was coming from and discovered that the battery pack was warped and smoking. In fear of a fire I ripped it out of the controller and tossed it in the sink, the inside of the battery pack was popping, sizzling, smoking, and the plastic casing was bubbling like it was boiling. Now my controller won’t work, even with normal batteries. To say the least I am very disappointed. Definitely not worth your money if it has potential to burn your house down.
customer_reviews.author: Bailey T.

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: Works great and easy to use. Cheaply made, which is expected from the price. Be careful when plugging the cable into it because the port it easy to get out of alignment. It might be hard to tell from the picture but the port is pushed in and slightly to the left from one time of accidentally trying to plug the corn in upside down. Still work fine, it's juts harder to plug into.
customer_reviews.author: Camokid

customer_reviews.title: Great Concept but Defective Item
customer_reviews.text: Initially I liked the product right out of the box. The battery packs snapped right in and was a nice fit. After 3 days of using/charging, one of the battery packs quit working. Down to one battery pack but still liked the ability to recharge the one I had left. Two days later the charging station will not light up/charge after plugging into multiple different outlets/blocks. Looks like I'll ride out this charge, and then have to switch back to AA batteries for the time being.
customer_reviews.author: Will Patton

customer_reviews.title: Get what you pay for
customer_reviews.text: For a $25 product, it's not bad. But you do get what you pay for. I've had these for a year and now they only hold a charge for an hour or less so I'm constantly swapping. I used to use rechargeable batteries from Target and they lasted well over 2 years before they started to degrade. Look - for the first year, it's worth it. Just keep in mind after that it's a coin flip. Hopefully your set does better than mine.
customer_reviews.author: Bogey Web Design

customer_reviews.title: Total garbage, threw out after a few months
customer_reviews.text: One of the two batteries won’t take or hold a charge a few months into using it. Whole point was to have a back up battery, very disappointed. Update: after a few months I ended up placing this entire setup into the trash. Don’t waste your time. Use rechargeable AA batteries w/ a decent charger and it’ll be easier, better battery time by more than double, and cheaper in the long run.
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: Never bought batteries for my controller ever again!
customer_reviews.text: The charging dock has honestly saved my life! I was getting frustrated with buying regular batteries all the time and having them run out on me. And also with microusb cables getting broken and in the way. Now i have the comfort of just placing the charger down and it automatically charges! I don't even think about the batteries anymore. It really has solved a major problem, since I use the controllers daily for hours. Love this product, would reccomend to anyone. Its cost effective too!
customer_reviews.author: Abdulrahman Abdalla

customer_reviews.title: Wish I could charge both packs w/out 2 controllers
customer_reviews.text: Works good. Charges pretty fast, but I only have 1 controller, & I want to charge the battery I’m not using that’s not on my controller. To do so, I have to set the other battery on the charger, and use something to hold it in place. Which is a pain, should be able to charge the other battery pack that you’re not using, easier. Other than that it works great for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Brandon Kelley

customer_reviews.title: Really easy to use
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my boyfriend because he had a charging stand that took forever to get the controllers balanced correctly for them to charge. Half the time we would just give up and buy batteries to use instead. I can't attest to the battery charge length created from this product because I have not been the one to consistently use this product but I can say that it is so easy to use and definitely charges them quickly.
customer_reviews.author: Happiness 1234

customer_reviews.title: Works great.
customer_reviews.text: Comes with its own batteries, but they are black so it will possibly ruin the color scheme of your controllers if they aren't also black. The best part about it is the contact charging. You just lay the controllers down into their individual cradle and a blinking green light on the front indicates charging. This way you're not ruining a charging port over a period of time.
customer_reviews.author: Nick

customer_reviews.title: Xbox controller charger
customer_reviews.text: Just got it a few days ago. So far so good! My son has a silicone cover on his. I got it for some kind of protection because he’s 8, he drops it sometimes. The part that connects to the charger is flat, so it needs a direct connection. I was able trim around each side with scissors, so he was able to keep the cover on his controller. It took a couple hours for a full charge. He only plays a couple hours daily if that. But so far it’s stayed charged for two days without dying.
customer_reviews.author: Coley

customer_reviews.title: I DO NOT RECOMMEND: Batteries did not last but a few weeks
customer_reviews.text: This looks great and is easy to use, but I have one major complaint. After about 6 weeks of use the batteries no longer hold a charge for more than about 5 minutes. I have barely used the one controller (and its battery) and that is the one that seems to be in even worse shape. I am not sure if mine is an exception, but I do not recommend this purchase. I have a request into Fosmon support to see if it will be covered by warranty and will update if it is.
customer_reviews.author: Lucas N.

customer_reviews.title: Great charger
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my son for the holidays and he loves it. We no longer are worrying about battery life and the expense of having to pick up more and more batteries. The controllers are ready to go when he needs them and don’t run out while he is playing. The lights that show when they’re charging are especially helpful. This product makes life a lot easier when dealing with Xbox remotes!
customer_reviews.author: Victoria Vigil

customer_reviews.title: worth it for sure!
customer_reviews.text: i was worried when i got it that it wouldn't work because it's so light weight. but that wasn't the case at all it works perfectly fine! i got because every time my brither gets a wire charger for his controllers he breaks them and then the most recent one he somehow broke the part on the controller that the charger goes in so nothing would charge it. so i got him this as a little gift he's was very excited
customer_reviews.author: lili

customer_reviews.title: Works as intended so far
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use, instructions are clear as day. Only downside is that it does NOT come with a power adapter. The end is a USB port. So be aware of that, I just used a regular adapter and it worked the same. The charging is a little odd because it flashes green to let you know that it’s charging, not that it’s finished. Otherwise if there’s anything else to report I will after testing it out for a few days.
customer_reviews.author: Vanessa Santana

customer_reviews.title: Nice product!
customer_reviews.text: When I first bought this item, I got a damaged one. But thanks to Amazon’s amazing return policy, I immediately got a replacement, and the new item worked great. I used to have another Xbox controller charger but the connection between the charger and the controller wasn’t stable; this new charger makes the problem disappear. I originally wanted to buy a charger from Microsoft, but Microsoft’s charger is too overpriced (almost $40 for a charger that only charges one controller). This charger can charge two controllers at the same time and has a lower price. If you’re looking for a charger with a better price but similar quality, this is the one!
customer_reviews.author: Jacob Shen

customer_reviews.title: Game on without low battery warnings!!
customer_reviews.text: We have a rule in the house, when you're not playing the controller is on the charger. With this rule we never run out of power when playing and my son will play for hours on end. Keep in mind that the battery packs have less MAH than using your normal AA batteries. However, the simplicity of dropping the controller on the charger and having it charge makes a world of difference. When I say drop I mean it, just drop it on the charger and it'll start charging. It lines up all on it's own. It's simple and it works!!
customer_reviews.author: KeyMan

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for someone with 2-3 controllers so one is always charging.
customer_reviews.text: I love this charging station. There's nothing more frustrating than when your batteries die, and I've found that with these, once they're drained, you gotta replace the pack ASAP if you don't want to die in your game! I think the way the battery falls into place a certain way is easy to do quickly, although you don't want to force it of course. The station lights up when you have a controller charging and I've had zero issues with the plug or any functionality. Love it! And it's so cheap. Would highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Vannessa

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: REVIEW BASED on ELITE CONTROLLER... Bought this for my husband so he could easily charge his controller instead of always switching out rechargeable batteries, even though it says compatible with the Xbox elite controller however after it was not connecting we found you have to remove the paddles to charge which defeats the purpose of getting this for convenience. Ended up returning and purchasing one that’s actually compatible with the elite. Batteries did not last as described either
customer_reviews.author: Bill Hubbard

customer_reviews.title: Pleasantly surprised
customer_reviews.text: When I first took it out of the box, I was concerned that it may be too light weight and want to slide off the entertainment center. Thankfully, they put rubber pads on the bottom that keep it from sliding on hard surfaces. The green indicator lights on the front make it easy to determine if it charging or finished charging. and the controllers set nicely in their respective ports. It's a great buy for the money and has all the necessary features.
customer_reviews.author: Wayne Kennedy

customer_reviews.title: Didn't hold charge
customer_reviews.text: Bought this maybe 3 weeks ago and noticed right away it charged quickly but after maybe 4 hours non continuous game play I had to recharge the pack. I had both charging, one attached to the controller and one I managed to charge without controller, which was difficult. I had the first battery last again for 4 hours and emailed the seller with no answer so I'll be returning these
customer_reviews.author: Amy

customer_reviews.title: 3.5 stars
customer_reviews.text: Battery life doesn't last as long as promised. We get more hours out of the disposable batteries, but in the long run, not having to continiously buy batteries will save us money so I don't regret the purchase. Also, you need to set the controller on the port exactly right to get it to charge. There is no holder or catch to keep the controller on the base, just the handles on the controller to balance it on the charging deck.
customer_reviews.author: violingypsy13

customer_reviews.title: cost doesnt out weigh quality in this case
customer_reviews.text: I tried two of these chargers since I thought the original was defective since it was not charging the batters when I put my elite controller on the base. come to find out it would only charge if I put the battery in one of the original controllers. given the price I figured no big deal I had 2 regular controllers I could just swap them out. then after only 2 days the battery's would die in less than 3 hours even fully charged. I ended up ordering the energizer brand one for a few more bucks.
customer_reviews.author: Gerard riddell

customer_reviews.title: Only use for non-elite controllers
customer_reviews.text: Works like a charm for regular controllers. The battery life lasts anywhere from 1 to 3 days depending on how much you play. If you are a hardcore gamer like myself, expect to charge your controller at the end of day 2. Does not charge appropriately for the elite controller. Even if you follow the instructions for the elite controller, expect charging to be a burden. It seems like it has to do with the weight of the controller. Once you are able to get a green light (took me 5 minutes), it will stop charging after a few minutes. 3 stars
customer_reviews.author: Keniba

customer_reviews.title: Great deal - comes with two battery backs, which alone are worth the price.
customer_reviews.text: Honestly, I'm pretty impressed by this charger. The fact that it comes with two battery packs is really the selling point. The battery packs are exceptional. Just for fun, I have played pretty much all weekend (Friday night, Saturday 8-10 hours, Sunday 8-10 hours) on one charge, and the battery was still going. So, they last at least 24 hours of gaming on a single charge. Also comes with a micro-USB cable to charge the whole thing, and looks pretty elegant. The plastic stand feels a bit flimsy, but doesn't make any difference in function.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew Hudson

customer_reviews.title: Little charger that could!
customer_reviews.text: This charger is great for its price. It’s simple design self centers the controllers and it takes no added effort to make sure each one is charging. If my son recently played the Xbox before me, I can tell which controller is still charging by the blinking LED light in the front. I would recommend this charger if you are on the fence.
customer_reviews.author: Leo Ramos

customer_reviews.title: The source of power for it is a usb it doesn’t plug into the wall.
customer_reviews.text: PROS: This controller charger has saved my life! And money! I no longer have to buy batteries! As a hardcore gamer that’s one thing we worry about is in the middle of playing you get stopped by a low battery signal. No more! Easy to use easy and simple to install. I love this. Cons: it’s only power source is a usb. Which is fine I plug it into the back of my Xbox one but still id like a wall plug in. Another con is it feels cheap but it works well. By how it feels cheap I mean it’s light and the plastic feels like it could break it someone stepped on it.
customer_reviews.author: MyNameIsBatMan

customer_reviews.title: Good Transaction = Happy Customer.
customer_reviews.text: Not only was this product exactly what I wanted, and needed, I received an email the day before I received the product giving me step-by-step instructions to ensure proper setup and function, something I felt went above and beyond necessary from company, and that was refreshing. So far so good, everything seems to be functioning perfectly. The shipping time was fast, and the price was right. If you're in need of a new stand charger for your Xbox One controllers, you can't beat this one.
customer_reviews.author: wickedlostangel

customer_reviews.title: Worked at first, quickly broke without ever being moved. Pass.
customer_reviews.text: Worked great for a couple of months, now the lights don't work and more importantly the controllers don't charge. I'll be replacing it with another model. I took it apart to see if there were any obvious breaks and 1) there aren't 2) this thing is 90% air. I switch to a few different USB cables and none worked. Honestly not even sure what failed after investigating. Based on my experience with this charger, I would not buy or recommend buying Fosman products.
customer_reviews.author: areed67

customer_reviews.title: I mean I guess they’re ok
customer_reviews.text: It says the batteries last for like 30 hours or whatever, I have yet to see the batteries last for more than a day maybe 2 if I’m lucky and they die right in the middle of a game without warning but even though the batteries suck it’s still better than the alternative of buying expensive batteries at the store every few weeks
customer_reviews.author: spencer

customer_reviews.title: Fits the xbox one controllers
customer_reviews.text: This comes with two batteries, and they fit the xbox one controllers perfectly. The charger comes with a usb cord only, so you will need a wall adapter if you dont want to plug it into your usb port on your xbox. The controllers sit on the charger. The light will remain red until the controllers are fully charged. Once fully charged the light will turn green.
customer_reviews.author: Mommy of two 0207

customer_reviews.title: Works good!
customer_reviews.text: I haven't been using this charger for too long, but it seems to work well. The initial charge out of the box got me and my girlfriend through like 6 to 7 hours of gaming. The only problem I had with it, is that one of the battery packs that came with it, had plastic clips that we're manufactured wrong, so I couldn't slide it into my controller correctly. I used a pair of scissors to pry the 2 plastic tabs so they were straight, then it slid perfectly into place in my controller.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan D.

customer_reviews.title: Works as advertised!
customer_reviews.text: I wanted to use this for a few days before I reviewed it. I bought it for my son, as he really wanted rechargeable controllers. This one had good reviews, so it seemed like a safe bet. Works well. Good charge. Doesn't take up too much space. I didn't really think about his controllers being white at the time lol. But he didn't care and he's happy overall.
customer_reviews.author: Crystal

customer_reviews.title: *Updated* Good Customer Service
customer_reviews.text: *Update- After I posted the review below the company reached out to me stated they believed my unit was defective and they quickly sent me a replacement which is working well. They made sure I would be satisfied with the new product which I am. It is a nice little charger, the controlled rear in it easily and definately makes life easier. I've had this charger for a bit over 3 months and am only a very casual user- mostly netflix - after about 2 months I noticed the life span of the charge dwindling. Now the charge only lasts about an hour before dying- not worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley

customer_reviews.title: Had to fix the front pins myself
customer_reviews.text: The charging pins for the front controller sat too low and didn't make contact with the battery. I had to open up the unit and modify the plastic to allow for the pins to sit higher. With one of the two batteries the controller will just unexpectedly shut off without a low power warning not long after I start playing. So I effectively only have 1 working battery.
customer_reviews.author: B. Fossen

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't snap into place, bad design but does last a week with moderate gaming.
customer_reviews.text: They last about a week with moderate gaming, my problem with it is it doesn't snap into place and I have to tape it up so it doesn't come out. Also if one of the prongs that snap into the bottom of controller get messed up at all or broken off then gotta take the entire thing. If it comes out a fraction of a centimeter mid game controller disco, shouldn't have to tape it to make it work. Going back to Energizer ones that fit into the controller where you don't even need to use the cover if you don't want to. Wouldn't order again.
customer_reviews.author: James Doerner

customer_reviews.title: Average at best
customer_reviews.text: The charger works fine, but the battery life last about 3 hours, even if I let the battery packs charge for 5+ hours it still last roughly 3 hours, and when I check the battery level it always says half full and never more. Still great to use if you don’t mind simultaneously switching between the two battery packs. Maybe I just got a charging deck that was somewhat defective.
customer_reviews.author: Tyler

customer_reviews.title: Worth it for the price
customer_reviews.text: I took a chance for the price and it has been nice not having to mess with cables. The batteries replaced the covers on the back of the controllers (so keep those stored) and the whole thing just sets nicely on the charger where indicator lights let you know if it is then charging. No problems in the two months I've had them.
customer_reviews.author: Skol!

customer_reviews.title: The stand feels very flimsy and appears cheaply made.
customer_reviews.text: The first one I received only charged 1 of the controllers. This was due to the stand, not the batteries. Tested by placing the controller that was known to charge properly on the other slot and it wouldnt charge on the disfunctional port. I ordered a replacement and already received it and they both work now. Only giving 4 stars because of the inconvenience of having to take this to the post office to replace (because the size is too big to put in the mailbox).
customer_reviews.author: Will Campbell

customer_reviews.title: Convenience and money saver!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect fit and finish that replaces the normal battery cover with the new battery housing. Two controllers slide right into the cradle. Green lights flash wile charging and are steady at full charge. The usb plugs into one of the rear ports on the xbox which is active even when the console is off. We just leave controllers in the dock ehen not in use so they are always ready to go.
customer_reviews.author: Steve Gladfelter

customer_reviews.title: Very easy, works great!
customer_reviews.text: This charger works so well! You literally just pop in the new batteries and charge the controller(s). It takes a couple hours to achieve a fully charge, and I'm logging about 24 hours of actual gameplay before having to charge again. I play with a headset plugged in to the controller, so I'm sure playtime would be even higher were that not the case. The only thing to really know beforehand is that you will need your own USB charging block (like what comes with your cellphone) to provide power to the charger. Not a big deal for most folks. In summary, 10/10, highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Christy A. Simmons

customer_reviews.title: Great for smaller entertainment systems
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my Xbox One S Console because I was honestly tired of paying for batteries. This station is decent at holding charge and it occupies a small amount of space which is exactly what I wanted for my entertainment system. My only complaint would be to ask for a longer cord to connect to the Xbox. Solid purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Nick Rinz

customer_reviews.title: Dont holds a charge dies quickly... overtime
customer_reviews.text: I work alot and I dont even play the game that much. When I first starting using it it was ok. Then I noticed that after 6 hours of charging it wasn't fully charge. I would charge both of them then use them and I would get 2 hours to play my game then I had to switch out the batteries. At this point it was the middle of the month. Also when ever I charge it the battery never stays full. Now going towards the even of the month i can only play for 20 to 40 minutes. I had to return this items..🤷‍♂️
customer_reviews.author: Anthony W.

customer_reviews.title: Works great for PC
customer_reviews.text: This charger works wonders for my controller, as I don't own a Xbox One anymore, I can charge my wireless Xbox One controller to use with my bluetooth adapter from Microsoft for some good ol' wireless gaming on PC. The only downside is getting the batteries on and off, if I need to switch one off I always feel like I'm damaging the pins on my Xbox controller every time I take them off and on (even though I'm not).
customer_reviews.author: Jameson Fuller

customer_reviews.title: Great price
customer_reviews.text: There are a couple of things that I like and dislike about this charging dock. The first thing I like is the price. It's pretty good for what you get. I also like that it comes with 2 rechargeable batteries. I don't like that you basically HAVE to use those batteries only. I don't think it'll recharge the original Xbox battery. I like how the light blinks while it's charging and stops when it's charged. It does take a while to recharge and I feel like it doesn't hold a charge for long. But overall, I recommend it!
customer_reviews.author: Nova

customer_reviews.title: Good product, good price!
customer_reviews.text: Nice packaging. Fits well in the controllers and the controllers fit well on the charging station. I’ll be happy to not have to buy batteries! One complaint is that they did not provide a usb plug for the cord to plug into the wall which is seeming to become more common. The device is not very heavy and the provided cord is not very long. However, everything seems to be working properly and the price was good- just as much as other rechargeable batteries and you don’t have to take the batteries in and out!
customer_reviews.author: Kcbill901

customer_reviews.title: You gotta hand it to The Fos!
customer_reviews.text: Love this Fosman charging station! Seems to charge quickly. Nestles yhe controllers perfectly. Green status lights are handy. Flash when charging, steady when done. Wish the lights had an off switch but easy enough to cover. This charger will eventually psy for itself in battery savings...not to mention no more unexpected controller deaths in the middle of a heated battle! Gotta’ hand it to The Fos.....mon! Well done!
customer_reviews.author: C. Shay

customer_reviews.title: Came with two rechargeable batteries for Xbox one
customer_reviews.text: Works great with the Xbox one controllers. I received them and replaced the old batteries from two of my controllers with the two rechargeable ones this came with, plugged the charging stand in and left them to charge. When they were charging two lights blinked green on the front of the docking station. When fully charged the blinking green light turned solid. Pretty easy!
customer_reviews.author: Suzie Homemaker

customer_reviews.title: Just doesn't last
customer_reviews.text: I wanted to make the switch from AAs to a rechargeable, but this isn't really working for me. IMO the charge just doesn't last long enough. Whenever I use, I end up having to put AAs in after about 90 minutes of gameplay. I will continue to use, but these are really a supplemental battery source versus a primary battery source unless you are a very light gamer.
customer_reviews.author: btip

customer_reviews.title: Everything a charger should be!
customer_reviews.text: I bought an Energizer charger back when we first got our Xbox One and it was getting to the point where if you walked past it the connectors would stop charging. So...rather than continue fighting with QTips and alcohol, cleaning strangely sensitive connection points, etc., I ordered up this new charger. I have to say that I am SO happy with it so far. Does everything you would want from a charger. You just set the controller down in the stand. Boom. So far, this has been doing an excellent job!!!
customer_reviews.author: Lloyd

customer_reviews.title: Controller Charger
customer_reviews.text: I got this for my husband. He's been using it for a year now, and everything is still working well. They are much more convenient then charging via the usual cable. They are contact chargers, no hooking or docking required. You can actually charge just the battery if you place it right and leave a little pressure on top.
customer_reviews.author: Sandy

customer_reviews.title: Good product!
customer_reviews.text: I really like this... you get two battery packs, it charges quickly, I've not managed to run it out of battery life even in an all day session, and it doesn't take up a lot of space. It is difficult to insert the battery pack and they understand that - they make it abundantly clear how to do it, though it's still not easy. Once you get it, though, boom... you're up and running. Be warned, though, there's no wall plug... it's USB only.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Batteries do not last
customer_reviews.text: First let me say they have good customer service. I received my initial order, charged the batteries and tried using them. The charge did not last for more than 10-15 minutes. I emailed the company and explained the situation, they mailed new battery packs which I charged as soon as I got them. This time one of the battery packs lasts 10 minutes and the other lasts about 30 minutes. I gave 2 stars because they sent replacement batteries, even though those weren't much better.
customer_reviews.author: Ruagoat

customer_reviews.title: Find something else.
customer_reviews.text: Battery life is abysmally short compared to regular batteries and other rechargables I and others I know have had. Less than 8 hours if vibration is turned on and take about 3 hours to charge. Fortunately I'm only using one controller at a time because I'm quite frequently charging the other while I play. I won't be buying these again.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works well and great customer service
customer_reviews.text: I bought my battery charger back in January. It worked amazing for the first 7 months. About a week ago it stopped charging. I contacted the manufacturer and they replaced it free of charge. Since the product worked great up until then I would definitely recommend it. I would usually get two-three days out of a battery and I am a heavy gamer lol (minimum of 3 hours a night).
customer_reviews.author: Slinky816

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't plug into outlets. Please note it only plugs into USB ports to charge!
customer_reviews.text: So I ended up using a usb charger converter with this to make it work as my xbox has no room near it for usb plugging. Not to mention I can't imagine that is good for the health of the gaming rig to be constantly pulling charge. This product needs to be sold with a usb to outlet converter! Besides that it charges very fast and stays on the charge holster well without needing guidance. Sleep design and not too bright of charge lights.
customer_reviews.author: Mason Grey

customer_reviews.title: Works wonderful. Had to rerate
customer_reviews.text: This product works wonderful. Had to edit this because at first I wasn't even sure if the thing was working. But it does. And it works well. Been using it since I bought it a few months ago and it's a great buy. Only thing wrong with it is the lights on it to manage when done charging so forth don't work very well.
customer_reviews.author: Kris

customer_reviews.title: my boyfriend has like 4 xbox controllers and he is always leaving his ...
customer_reviews.text: my boyfriend has like 4 xbox controllers and he is always leaving his crazy long charger everywhere i can trip so I decided to buy this so that charger can be put away or something! It works great he loves it! At first he was a little frustrated with it bc switching out the battery was a bit tough but he figured it out and even his smaller brother comes in and grabs one to replace it with another. Also once you put a controller to charge a green light starts blinking but one it’s fully charged it’s solid green.
customer_reviews.author: katt

customer_reviews.title: Must have!
customer_reviews.text: If youre like me, i play games a lot and watch netflix on my xbox. Which means batteries die so fast! It came early which was awesome! I put them on charge for the first time overnight and they were ready when i got up. They work and fit great! Its light but doesnt feel cheap and i really like that! It also has grips on the bottom so it doesnt slide around on my table!!! My only problem is it didnt have the part that goes into the wall so i had to find an old iphone one. Other than that, im very pleased!!
customer_reviews.author: Gillian

customer_reviews.title: Great Gift, Does as expected
customer_reviews.text: Christmas 2016 gift. Has two battery packs that charge on the base when set in the controller. Havent quite determined battery life as the only times the controller has died is when we didnt know if it was put back on the base before bed night before. So, good since it's usually off the base for 8+ hours. Base can be easily put anywhere as it doesnt take up room. The charge lights are not super bright so if it's in a bedroom it shouldnt be too much of a distraction.
customer_reviews.author: Kaitie

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use
customer_reviews.text: My husband and I are both gamers. We got this to use as a back up battery charger. We have not had any issues with it breaking or not charging our batteries. The only bad thing I can say about this is in the back you have to make sure you seat your second controller and watch for the light to come on. One time we thought it was seated but it actually wasn't. (Yes we fought over whos battery was not charged) :) Other then that we have had no issues.
customer_reviews.author: Allie

customer_reviews.title: Keeps me from having to buy more batteries
customer_reviews.text: So, I've had the charger for about two weeks now. I was a bit upset because it had no charging brick, but I got lucky because I am in a new house, and I had the builder put in USB-A connectors into the power outlets. Beyond that, the charger does what it's supposed to do, charges the controller, so my kid isn't killing me with battery costs. As of my experience so far, I would recommend others getting this charger.
customer_reviews.author: Chris M Hardy

product_meta.title: Fosmon Dual Controller Charger Compatible with Xbox One/One X/One S Elite Controllers, (Two Slot) High Speed Docking Charging Station Kit with 2 Rechargeable Battery Packs - Black
product_meta.description:
Charge Multiple Controllers with Fosmon Dual Controller Charger
Fosmon's Dual charging station compatible with Xbox One Controllers replaces your controller's battery housing, turning them into rechargeable battery packs. Simply plug the base into an open USB slot on the Xbox One, or into a USB charger. 

Longer Lasting Rechargeable Batteries 
Fosmon's controller charging station provides up to 30-33 hours of standby time with the 1000mAh NiMH battery packs. They are built to last, with a lifespan of over 1,000 charge cycles.

Quick and Efficient Charging
When not gaming, simply put the equipped Xbox One Controller on the Charging Station and it will start charging automatically without the need to remove the battery. This is a quick and easy process to charge each controller, thanks to the dual conductive leads.

Green LED Indicator
The helpful green LED indicator will blink when a controller is being charged, and stays glowing to let the user know that charging is complete.

 Limited Lifetime Warranty 
We have served millions of customers for more than 10 years and every product comes with a limited lifetime warranty. Got a question? Reach out to our experienced and dedicated USA based customer support 24 hours a day, 7 days a week. Please refer to Fosmon website for more information. 

Specifications 
Input: USB Micro-B 
Output: USB Type-A 
Charging Time: 4-5 Hours 
Charge Cycles: >1000 
Battery Information: 1000mAh NiMh Rechargeable Battery Packs 
Battery Life: Up to 30-33 hours of play time 
Battery Safety: SGS certified UL 2054 Standard 

Package Includes 
1 x Dual Charging Station 
2 x 1000mAh NiMH Rechargeable Battery Packs 
1 x 4ft Micro-USB Charging Cable (power adapter not included) 

Compatible with Xbox One/ Xbox One S/ Xbox One S Battlefield/ Xbox One X/ Xbox One Elite controllers.

[LONGER BATTERY LIFE] The Fosmon controller charging station's 1000mah NiMH battery packs provide up to 30-33 hours of play time.

[EASY TO USE] When not gaming, simply put the equipped controller on the charging station and it will begin charging automatically without needing to remove the battery. The green LED indicator will blink when the controller is being charged, and stays lit to signal that charging is complete.
[LIMITED LIFETIME WARRANTY] This product comes with a limited lifetime warranty. Please refer to Fosmon’s website for more information.
